name: King's Massacre
description:
This was a game made for the NUSGDG week 5 game jam.

It was put together by 4 students with little experience in creating games in under 9 hours.

Play as the King who has had enough of relying on his subordinates and takes the battle to the monsters himself in this top-down beat-em up.

Arif - UI, Enemy pathfinding and projectile attack

Jeremiah - Player health, attack, movement and animations

Titus - Enemy Health and attack along with animations

Li Yuan - Level design and player interaction

Credits:
